description:
Thanks to the easy-going nature of their peers, Nico and Morihito continue their everyday lives as a witch and an ogre. One day on the weekend, when Nico and Morihito are relaxing at home, a package arrives from Nico’s mother, Ibuki. Attached is a letter addressed to Morihito, which had a new prophecy that read, "Dogs and raindrops will bring disaster." Morihito is a little confused but tries to exercise cautious, and then…
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Fresh Transparent Fashions for Spring / Witch`s Delivery Service / Lost Dogs and the Patter of Rain
Haru no See-through Coord / Majo ni Takkyuubin / Maigoinu to Ame no Beat
Printemps et tenue transparente / Une livraison pour la sorcière / Chien errant sous pluie battante
Prześwitujące kreacje na wiosnę / Podniebna poczta Nico / Zagubiony pies i rytm deszczu
春のシースルーコーデ / 魔女に宅急便 / 迷子犬と雨のビート
